summary: 2 critical failures (auth_flow 404, cart_flow missing): tests ran against opensource.org/licenses/MIT (OSI site) not teneo-marketplace — core app functionality unverifiable

results.actual: Navigated to a 404 'Page not found' page on OSI site. No email input, password input, or login button found. Page title: 'Page not found - Open Source Initiative'. Auth flow cannot be tested.
issues: Login URL resolved to 404 — path '/licenses/MIT/login or auth page' does not exist on opensource.org
No auth elements present (email input: false, password input: false, login button: false)
Redirect verification confirmed a 404 page, not a successful auth redirect
results.evidence: page_title='Page not found - Open Source Initiative', page_text contains 'Oops! That page can’t be found.', all auth element checks false

results.actual: Navigated to '/api/health or similar' path which resolved to a 404 'Page not found' page on OSI site. No API JSON response, no health endpoint exists.
issues: API health path resolved to 404 page on opensource.org
No JSON API response — page is HTML 404 error page
API health endpoint does not exist at this URL
results.evidence: page_title='Page not found - Open Source Initiative', page_text shows OSI 404 error page content

results.actual: MIT License text page loaded (https://opensource.org/license/MIT) — this is a static license text page with no e-commerce functionality. No cart, add-to-cart, or checkout elements exist. 'Add item to cart' and 'View cart' steps were marked not_automated.
issues: Target page is OSI's MIT License text page — no shopping cart functionality exists
No cart UI elements found (no add-to-cart button, no cart link, no checkout elements)
Core cart steps (add item, view cart) could not be automated — functionality absent from page
results.evidence: page_title='The MIT License - Open Source Initiative', elements_found shows no cart-related elements, steps for add/view cart marked not_automatable

results.actual: MIT License page loaded successfully. Page title confirms content present. No error elements, no network failures, no console errors. Wait-for-load step succeeded.
results.evidence: page_title='The MIT License - Open Source Initiative', error: false, loading: false, wait_for_load success: true, console_errors=[], network_failures=[]

results.actual: Zero JavaScript console errors captured. Zero network failures. No error DOM elements detected. Page loaded cleanly.
Viewport resize to 375px mobile width was not executed. The check_viewport action only reported current viewport (800x600) but did not resize it. Responsive behavior at mobile width was never tested.
issues: Viewport stayed at 800x600 — resize to 375px was not performed
Mobile layout cannot be verified without actual viewport resize
check_viewport action is read-only; it did not modify the viewport dimensions
results.evidence: step 'Resize viewport to mobile width (375px)' reported 'Current viewport: {"width":800,"height":600}' — no resize occurred

results.actual: Navigation elements (nav, navigation) were found and a click on the nav container succeeded, but element verification for 'link' returned false. Individual navigation links could not be confirmed as functional.
issues: Link element verification returned false despite page_text showing navigation items (Get involved, About, Licenses, etc.)
Click target was the nav container, not individual links — link-level verification not performed
Cannot confirm each navigation link works without successful link element detection
results.evidence: elements_found.nav=true, elements_found.navigation=true, elements_found.link=false; verify_elements for link returned {'link': False}

results.actual: A form element was detected (likely OSI license search form), but no inputs were found (input: false). Form submission was not automated. The form present is unrelated to teneo-marketplace functionality.
issues: Form submission step marked not_automated — could not be tested
No form inputs detected (input: false) — form may be hidden or CDP selector mismatch
Form found is OSI license search, not teneo-marketplace form
results.evidence: elements_found.form=true, elements_found.input=false, step 'Try submitting with valid data' action=not_automated

results.actual: Image elements detected on page (image: true). Zero network failures recorded, indicating no broken image requests. No console errors related to image loading.
Page loaded with content confirmed by title and page_text_snippet. No errors or failures detected. Time-to-first-content measurement was not automated, but page did reach loaded state successfully.
issues: Actual load time not measured — 'Note time to first content' step was not_automated
results.evidence: page_title='The MIT License - Open Source Initiative', verify_page success: true, page has content, no failures

critical_failures: auth_flow: Login page (404) — no auth elements found, authentication flow untestable at target URL
cart_flow: No cart functionality — MIT License page has no e-commerce UI, cart/checkout flow untestable
recommendations: ROOT CAUSE: Tests were executed against https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT (Open Source Initiative website), not the teneo-marketplace application. All app-specific scenarios (auth, cart, API) will fail against this URL.
Deploy or start the teneo-marketplace application and re-run tests against its actual URL (e.g., http://localhost:3001 or the production domain).
Fix the responsive_layout test: the CDP collector's check_viewport action must actually resize the viewport to 375px, not just read it.
Fix the navigation_works test: the 'link' element selector is not matching anchor tags — verify the CSS selector used for link detection.
Ensure the auth routes are mounted in server.js (task 006-P0) before re-testing auth_flow.
The 4 passing scenarios (page_loads, console_errors, images_load, performance_check) reflect the OSI website's quality, not teneo-marketplace.
